SEARCH
Package blot.engine.input.blotLibrary

Class DrawingObject

java.lang.Object
blot.engine.input.blotLibrary.DrawingObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConfinedDrawingObject
public class DrawingObject extends Object
A structure similar to Blot's polylines. The connection from the input layer to the processing layer.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DrawingObject()
    All drawingObjects are initialized with the assumption that it is centered at Canvas.WIDTH / 2, Canvas.HEIGHT / 2
    DrawingObject(DrawingObject drawingObject)
    Basically, DrawingObject newObject = drawingObject.clone().

  • Constructor Details

    • DrawingObject

      public DrawingObject()
      All drawingObjects are initialized with the assumption that it is centered at Canvas.WIDTH / 2, Canvas.HEIGHT / 2

    • DrawingObject

      public DrawingObject(DrawingObject drawingObject)
      Basically, DrawingObject newObject = drawingObject.clone(). Actually, I don't remember why I didn't just do this.
      Parameters:
      drawingObject - The drawingObject to copy.

  • Method Details

    • getOrigin

      public Point getOrigin()
      Getter method for the drawingObject's origin.
      Returns:
      The origin

    • setOrigin

      public void setOrigin(Point origin)
      Changes the drawingObject's origin, and translates every path accordingly.
      Parameters:
      origin - The new origin to change to.

    • newLine

      public void newLine()
      Adds a new path to the DrawingObject. In practice, this equates to lifting the pen.

    • addPoint

      public void addPoint(Point point)
      Appends a point to the current path.
      Parameters:
      point - the point to add to the current path.

    • deletePoint

      public void deletePoint()
      Removes the last point from the current point.

    • getLastPath

      public ArrayList<Point> getLastPath()
      Returns the last path in the DrawingObject.
      Returns:
      the last path.

    • confine

      public ConfinedDrawingObject confine(double left, double bottom, double right, double top)
      Rescales and translates a drawing object to fit within a specified bounds.
      Parameters:
      left - the bound's left x value
      bottom - the bound's bottom y value
      right - the bound's right x value
      top - the bound's top y value

    • getBounds

      public Point[] getBounds()
      Gets the bounds for the drawingObject. This is NOT bottomLeft, topRight. This is bottomLeft, widthHeight.
      Returns:
      Two points: the bottom left corner, and the width/height.

    • getPaths

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<Point>> getPaths()
      Getter method for this drawingObject's paths.
      Returns:
      The paths.

    • clone

      public DrawingObject clone()
      Deep copies this drawingObject's path, copies the origin as well. The origin shouldn't be mutated anyway, but you know what they say about safety/sorry
      Overrides:
      clone in class Object

    • update

      public void update(DrawingObject drawingObject)
      This is like set().update() in python I have no idea if this works with two different origins. I hope so
      Parameters:
      drawingObject - The drawingObject to update paths with
